Jan Algermissen wrote:
> There isn't much value in parameters as part of a Content-Type header
> anyhow, because
> you just cannot predict if there is an intermediary that strips the
> params off.
> 

Is this theory or practice?  Considering that charset is an important 
parameter for many media types, this would be a huge bug in a proxy cache.

Bill
